subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Gators scored a team-record 71 points against Jackson State in the second half Friday night while Purdue has allowed more than 71 points over all in a victory only once this season.
snippet: The Gators scored a team-record 71 points against Jackson State in the second half Friday night while Purdue has allowed more than 71 points over all in a victory only once this season.
